    • Method Detail

      • getRating

        public int getRating()

        Rating number to display.

        Arc percentage is based off of this value.

        Setting the value will automatically update view.

        Rating number to display.

        Arc percentage is based off of this value.

        Setting the value will automatically update view.

      • addArcThresholdColor

        public void addArcThresholdColor(int threshold,
                                 int color)

        Adds the arc color to be displayed within the given threshold. To change color, simply override the threshold

        Example: Calling addThreshold(10, Color.RED), will display the color red for values 0-10 Furthermore, calling addThreshold(5, Color.BLACK), will display the color black from 0-5 and the color red from 6-10

        Parameters:
        threshold - number below which color should be displayed
        color - color to be displayed within the threshold limits

      • addArcThresholdColor

        public void addArcThresholdColor(@NotNull
                                 java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> map)

        Adds given map of arc color to be displayed within the given threshold. To change color, simply override the threshold

        Parameters:
        map - map of threshold(key) and color(value) to be displayed within the threshold limits

      • removeArcThresholdColor

        public void removeArcThresholdColor(int threshold)

        Removes the arc color to be displayed for the threshold NOTE: Threshold value of 0 must be the last one to be deleted, ie. all other values must be deleted first

        Parameters:
        threshold -

      • removeAllArcThresholdColor

        public void removeAllArcThresholdColor()

        Removes all threshold colors for the arc
